website_summaries.verdict: This neck warmer offers more protection than a scarf, but is not too constricting. We recommend it for winter weather jogs, outdoor sporting events and sledding.
pros: Elastic edges maintain strong hold on nose and ears
Fleece lining is very soft and substantial
cons: The fit can be loose, allowing cold air to penetrate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice... soft, fits well, stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received this -- it was nicer than I expected. It is top quality, and the color piping on the edges looks very good when worn. The color piping also makes it easy to find when you are looking for it. It stretches well, isn't too small, and is very soft and comfortable. Really, I cannot find fault with it. I'm looking forward to wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: 90Below

customer_reviews.title: Not for freezing weather
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this would be for freezing temps, but it’s not warm enough for that. I went walking when it was 20 F and it was really cold still. Maybe it would be better for actual jogging where your body temp is up a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerJ

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this will be a nice addition to my wardrobe when bicycle riding or running in the winter. I think most people will tuck this into their shirt or jacket, which will conceal the high vis contrast stitching along the bottom edge of the gaiter. No worries there, as the top edge has the same high contrast stitching. Looks to be well made- no loose threads or obvious stitching flaws. Like a lot of products marketed to those of us who will choose to brave the elements, this is a little more expensive than it seems like it should be. But I am confident it will keep the icicles from forming beneath my nose!
customer_reviews.author: gocubzgo

customer_reviews.title: Warmth in a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a backpacking trip in the mountains. It kept me warm on the hike and throughout the night. As a bonus, it is lightweight and takes up very little space in a pack.. While wearing it over my nose it stayed in place and was loose and comfy when wearing it loose on my neck. I am a huge fan of TrailHeads and own quite a few of their products and have not been disappointed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, not bulky either like many of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, not bulky either like many of my scarfs, but roomy enough makes it comfortable, pulls up nicely over my mouth and ears, very warm. I wear it out on my long walks in northeast winters. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: M. St Yves

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is loose enough to cover my mouth and nose but not where it is so snug against my face. Lately, I have been wearing it as a mask to go to supermarkets (covid-19).
customer_reviews.author: DYOZ

customer_reviews.title: great for really cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking neck warmer and great for really cold weather. Blocks the wind and comfortable to put on. recommended for MC riders. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Buys

customer_reviews.title: Neck warmer
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t wore it yet but we haven’t had much of winter in mi yet. Tried it on though and love it
customer_reviews.author: jmgrad

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! it is loose enough to fit over my head, yet tight enough to stay exactly where I put it. It helps keep me warm in the cold Alaskan winter!
customer_reviews.author: Visit Amazing Alaska (Blogger)

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good So Far.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it, but unfortunately coming to the end of the cold season so I really haven't had the chance to test it out. But from what I can see I will be satisfied with this. Looks durable and comfortable. The only thing I would of like to see on this would be a cinch cord to tighten the top. But I can live without it. Will find out next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Great neck scarf
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, the polar fleece seemed thinner than I was looking for. However, it is much warmer than it looks. I am extremely cold intolerant so I needed something warm and that would cover my ears and nose. I am really satisfied with the way the lining is made such that it stays on your nose and you don't have to keep pushing it back up from it falling. This was worth the price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Neiman

customer_reviews.title: easy to pull up to cover or just wear it ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! it doesn't itch her neck or face, easy to pull up to cover or just wear it on her neck like a fashionable piece of clothing it keeps her warm all day, I am very pleased with this product. came on good time with excellent service I would definitely buy from them again for any of my winter needs.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Covers the face, neck and ears really well
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my son. Covers his face, neck and ears really well. He wore it yesterday in -7 degree, snowy weather and stayed warm
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Good for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I ride bikes in cold temps. It is a great wind blocker and keeps the warmth. Its soft too.
customer_reviews.author: ksmile

customer_reviews.title: very effective product
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this gaiter. It stays up over the nose and ears. My head is small, yet it does not fall down. It can be used inside over a crew neck to make it into a cowl neck. It worked for me when using a snowblower to keep the moisture off my face.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this much, due to an unseasonable warm winter in the NE. But still a great buy, will use for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Krista S.

customer_reviews.title: ... walking or running in the cold this one fit great, is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 different things to put over my mouth/nose when out walking or running in the cold this one fit great,is comfortable, and kept the cold wind from my lungs. Plus the color trim makes you look less like a burglar : )
customer_reviews.author: WASHBURN

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, cozy, cozy
customer_reviews.text: I really love this neck gaiter. It's warm, fleecy, and can cover my neck, chin, and ears if needed. Plus, the pink gives it the girly touch to make it look feminine (or has other colors if you don't want it to)! Love on chilly bike rides when I need just that something extra to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perry

customer_reviews.title: IT MEETS MY EDPECTIONS ALTHOUGH I THINK IT WOULD BE A LITTLE BETTER IF MADE OF HEAVIER WEIGHT FABRIC
customer_reviews.text: II GOT IT BECAUSE OF THE VARIETY OF WAYS IT CAN BE USED. IT MEETS MY EDPECTIONS ALTHOUGH I THINK IT WOULD BE A LITTLE BETTER IF MADE OF HEAVIER WEIGHT FABRIC.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: I work in a freezer in a warehouse, and this keeps me warm, and stays in place comfortably. It also keeps the wind out when I am driving in there. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this comfortable gaiter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I never realized this until I actually owned one. I love the cold weather but it hurts my arthritic neck and I am also prone to sinus infections. Pull this gaiter up over your nose and both problems are fixed. Love it. Very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: I would buy in more colors. Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect because I don't like a cold neck. Added bonus: doesn't gives me static shocks like other fabrics! Covers the neck, including lower neck, nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Elot

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a neck warmer while riding a motorcycle in cold weather. For this is is perfect... fluffy enough to fill the gap around my coat collar and helmet but not so large as to hinder movement of the helmet. Wish I had bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N Mikulaninec

customer_reviews.title: This is really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, but it falls down as I run, probably for hikers or walkers its perfect. I ordered another that had a cord to adjust it and that one is perfect. This one is great to and great quality. Just no way to adjust for tightness to stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques7

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. The recipient is very pleased with it. It is comfortable and warm without being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: too loose
customer_reviews.text: It is so loose it does not grip your neck comfortably and any chill would easily get into your neck. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Neck Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck warmer. It is perfect for running in the winter time. So far I've used it during a 4 mile race snowshoeing and and it was wonderful for both occassions. I love the color and it does a great job of keeping my neck and chin warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product all winter long. It is comfortable and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Deck

customer_reviews.title: Of the neck gaiters that I own, this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Of the neck gaiters that I own, this one is the most 'no frills'. It is very warm, though, and is long enough that I can pull it over my ears if I've forgotten my hat, without exposing my neck to the cold. The pink edging is cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it needs to do. Keep your neck warm without fussing with a scarf. I don't know about sub-zero temperatures, but it was great n 20 degree weather when I wanted the wind off my neck. Easy to use and wash. Wash and hang dry!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Stays up and doesn't fall. Keeps my neck warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these as X-Mas gifts and both are worn daily. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Genae

customer_reviews.title: everytime she goes out
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves this, she wears it a lot, thanks for such a quality product
customer_reviews.author: JETS69

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's too large for me, so fits loosely and lets the wind in. Also, a bit thinner than I would have expected, so overall not great for MN winters. Appears to be well-made, though.
customer_reviews.author: Shakopeg

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Soft, warm and comfortable. What else can I say. I'm using mine with my full face helmet when I ride my motorcycle in the cold weather. It does a nice job of blocking the cold air that gets up under my chin.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Z

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: I wore the warmer on my early morning bike ride today (38F, no wind) and was very pleased with how warm and soft it felt. I would definitely recommend this product to fellow cyclists.
customer_reviews.author: ChunkyMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Short not sweet
customer_reviews.text: Photo shows product that appears to have maximum coverage. It is shorter and hard to stretch out. Not soft.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Really like this. Much more convenient than a scarf and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Much more convenient than a scarf and great for running.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good quality.. Keeps you warm on cold days. I purchased it to wear while bicycle riding.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found them
customer_reviews.text: Such well made products from this company. So glad I found them. The gaiter is great.
customer_reviews.author: judith/oregon

customer_reviews.title: A must have for cold northern winters
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota and the winters are cold. This is great because unlike a scarf it doesn't fall down all the time. A+
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Very warm on windy days. Much thicker than others ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm on windy days. Much thicker than others, but can still breathe
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Q.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need! Doesn't fall down and I'm moving around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: As a nighttime jogger, this worked very well. ...
customer_reviews.text: As a nighttime jogger, this worked very well. It provides protection from extreme cold while also allowing me to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: great fit & Comfortable & Warm!! Love it for my Asthma it filters the cold Air & is Warm. Trail heads is FASSTT Service too! 5 Stars . !
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good product, would definitely buy again if I lost mine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for riding my motorcycle. It keeps my neck warm and its soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Tyler

customer_reviews.title: warm
customer_reviews.text: I wear this for work every night . Band in top and Bottom are uncomfortable , but I fold them over and is super warm.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Snedeker

customer_reviews.title: but boy did I love this. Kept me warm outside
customer_reviews.text: Never had one, but boy did I love this. Kept me warm outside, and easy to take off and put in my bag when inside.
customer_reviews.author: LA Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice neck warmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice neck warmer. It's a bit large for my 9 year old, but an easy fix with a needle and thread.
customer_reviews.author: H.C.Lee

customer_reviews.title: keeps neck covered and warm
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Keeps my neck covered and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: Great neck warmer, and even works good to cover my ears. I'll buy more later
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cold air
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is too thin, I am still breathing in cold air. It's like having nothing on at all :-(
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: It was sub zero temps with high winds and I was very comfortable. I will be gifting these next season
customer_reviews.text: This kept me so warm all winter. It was sub zero temps with high winds and I was very comfortable. I will be gifting these next season!
customer_reviews.author: Tmow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good neck warmer and can cover your nose and mouth from the harsh wind by just pulling up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work outside during the winter and it was a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Kept my daughter warm on a trip to very cold weather!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for.Keeps the neck and ears warm.Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This face cover is just what I wanted. I needed something I could pull up and down easily and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda McLain

customer_reviews.title: Recipient seemed very happy to receive it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Recipient seemed very happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Used this durning a long run yesterday that started at 25 degrees or so. Very warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M Bourdeau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good neck warmer. Nice to run outside in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Merigon

customer_reviews.title: Your products are awesome! Hats Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Your products are awesome! Hats Fit well, gloves very versatile, great quality. I will continue to buy more products from Trail Heads! Best I have ever found!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Martin

customer_reviews.title: This product fits great, is warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: This product fits great, is warm and soft, stays in place during a run and also works well for sledding with the kids or walking to work. It did have a bit of a chemical smell coming out of the packaging, as other reviewers mentioned, but I found that it faded quickly.
customer_reviews.author: newenglandmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Much better than the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for outdoor runners!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for all outdoor activities especially running. Keeps me warm and covered without cooking me alive.
customer_reviews.author: alison lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Too small, returned
customer_reviews.text: It's not big enough. It's just average size and way too tight across my face. I was hopping from the reviews it would be different but is the same size as almost everything you find in stores. Seemed well made but returned immediately because fit. I'm 7 3/4 hat size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I used my neck warmer for skiing this winter. Fleece is not an ideal material with mouth moisture but it sure kept my neck and ears warm. I used cotton bandana inside of my neck warmer and it worked pretty well. I like the lime green ring which matches well with my jacket. I like my neck warmer a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Paige J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Met all my expectations. Very warm and keeps the temperature steady.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel  A.  Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold Michigan winters
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my cold Michigan runs. Love that I can pull it up or push it down as needed depending on those frigid headwinds. I do wish it was a little snugger, though. Like the color, it matches my hi-visibility running gear.
customer_reviews.author: Di B

customer_reviews.title: The asymetrical cut is a great idea but t's still too short to be effective ...
customer_reviews.text: The asymetrical cut is a great idea but t's still too short to be effective or staying in place during activity.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great if you just want to cover your neck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, thinking it would be versatile enough to wear as a head covering while running, as I do the Maxit headgator. However, it was just too short. I thought the picture was a bit deceiving. I ended up returning it and buying a second Maxit headgator for $20. If you really are just looking to cover your neck, I'm sure this would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and pump works GREAT. Only draw back is the hoses....you may have to change hoses or create adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P. Maddrey

product_meta.title: TrailHeads Fleece Neck Warmer/Gaiter
product_meta.description:
Don’t let falling temperatures slow you down! The TrailHeads Fleece Neck Warmer is a winter training essential. Perfect for running, cycling, skiing or hiking this lightweight circle scarf keeps your neck warm without the bulk and tangle of a traditional scarf. When the frigid blasts set in pull the plush, comfortable fleece up over your chin and nose to create a comfortable face mask. When the temperatures warm up this versatile accessory easily stows away in a jacket pocket.

The smooth poly / spandex binding adds a stylish accent to brighten your cold weather wardrobe. The binding is smooth on the skin and keeps the gaiter where you want it. Whether you’re on the road, the trail or the slopes, this handy winter accessory delivers the warmth and protection you need.

All our products come with our TRAIL TESTED GUARANTEE. If you’re not happy with your purchase, let us know and we’ll provide a replacement or refund with no fine print and no time limit—nothing but our commitment to doing whatever it takes to satisfy our customers.
feature_bullets: NOTE: Our neck warmers are designed as winter accessories for sports and outdoor activities. They are NOT designed to be protective medical face masks.
VERSATILE STYLE- Plush, lightweight 100% polyester fleece hugs your neck or pulls up over your chin and nose when sub freezing temps set in.
CONTOURED FIT- Don’t let the cold keep you from running! The contoured cut of the neck warmer’s opening ensures full neck coverage to protect you from winter’s harsh weather.
INCREDIBLY COZY- the soft, plush fleece and poly / spandex binding are comfortable against the skin.

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN -Simple yet highly effective - this tube scarf keeps the cold wind out and the warm air in during all your favorite cold weather outdoor activities. You’ll stay cozy whether you’re running, skiing, biking or hiking!
